ModMetaData.name: SNS AOTC: True Pinnacle of Creation
ModMetaData.author: explodoboy

li.displayName: Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic

ModMetaData.description: This mod is an official add-on for Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic. It effectively makes the Pinnacle of Creation technology the Fourth Generation (Gen1, Gen2, Gen Omega, and POC) of SNS: AOTC.
